EmailTemplate.description: This Email template is used for sending Security Code to the individuals who are registering on the portal for the first Time
EmailTemplate.name: Security Code Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Security Code from eSLA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message is automatically generated based upon a request for a security code submitted to the eSLA.
*Please do not reply to this email*
Dear {!Email_Notification__c.Param1__c} {!Email_Notification__c.Param2__c};
To register in the eSLA please begin by going to https://eSLA.wi.gov/
Please follow the steps below to create an account and review your profile information:
Click the "LOG IN" option. Click the "EXISTING DSPS CUSTOMER" button. Enter the following information:
Security Code: {!Email_Notification__c.Param3__c} Email:{!Email_Notification__c.Email__c}
Please note: You will also be prompted to enter your SSN, Date of Birth and to create and confirm a unique password.
Sincerely,
The Department of Safety and Professional Services
